Among other special matters which have engaged the attention of the Department are -(a) collection and utilisation of waste food and waste paper;(b) preparation of an Order, now before the Ministry of Food, imposing duties on local authorities in con-nection with food control;(c) conferences and deputations on National Service; infant Welfare, and the operation of the Increase of Rents etc. Act.overnment Board, March, 1917.
